Do not eat or drink in vehicle when working

No asking for personal contact details
No personal use of passenger information
No discrimination on any protected characteristic

vulnerable_passengers.intoxicated: Refuse if safety concern, assist if appropriate

journey_conduct.route: Take most direct reasonable route unless passenger requests otherwise
journey_conduct.prolongation: Criminal offence to unnecessarily prolong journey
journey_conduct.meter: Hackney carriage - engage meter at start of hiring
journey_conduct.fare: Hackney carriage - cannot charge more than meter shows
journey_conduct.property: Check for left property, hand in to police if not claimed

plying_for_hire: Must stop if available and safe to do so

ranks.usage: May wait at designated ranks only
ranks.first_cab: First cab on rank takes first fare
ranks.cannot_refuse: Cannot refuse fare from rank (except lawful excuse)

fares.tariff: Charge according to meter and approved tariff
fares.maximum: Tariff is maximum - can charge less if agreed
fares.extras: Only charge extras shown on tariff card
fares.no_charge: Wheelchairs and assistance dogs - no extra charge

private_hire_specific.pre_booking_only: Can ONLY accept bookings through licensed operator
private_hire_specific.standing_prohibited: Cannot wait or tout for business
private_hire_specific.ranks_prohibited: Cannot wait at taxi ranks - criminal offence
private_hire_specific.hailing_prohibited: Cannot accept street hailing - journey uninsured if do
private_hire_specific.operator_booking: All bookings must go through operator who issues booking to driver

smoking.prohibition: Smoking in licensed vehicle is criminal offence
smoking.applies: Even when vehicle not carrying passengers
smoking.signage: No smoking signs must be displayed

mobile_phones.driving: Illegal to use handheld phone while driving
mobile_phones.hands_free: Hands-free permitted but must not affect driving

lost_property.contact: Try to contact passenger if details available
lost_property.hand_in: Hand unclaimed property to police within 48 hours

faqs_and_common_scenarios.can_i_drive_taxi_with_ordinary_car_licen: No - you need a hackney carriage or private hire driver licence from the council in addition to your DVLA driving licence
faqs_and_common_scenarios.difference_between_taxi_and_private_hire: Taxis (hackney carriages) can be hailed in street and wait at ranks. Private hire must be pre-booked through operator. Different licences and rules apply.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.can_i_use_my_licensed_vehicle_for_person: Yes, but insurance must cover personal use as well as hire and reward. Plates must remain fitted.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.what_if_i_have_criminal_conviction: Depends on type, seriousness and time elapsed. See Common Standards policy. Each case assessed individually on whether you are fit and proper person.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.do_i_need_medical_every_year: Every 5 years if under 65, annually if 65 or over, or sooner if medical condition develops
faqs_and_common_scenarios.can_i_work_for_uber_lyft: These are private hire operators. You need private hire driver licence, your vehicle needs private hire vehicle licence, and operator (Uber/Lyft) needs operator licence. All must be from Gloucester if operating in Gloucester.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.what_if_licence_expires: Cannot work - illegal to drive licensed vehicle without current licence. Apply for renewal before expiry.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.can_i_drive_in_other_areas: Your Gloucester licence only valid for Gloucester-licensed vehicles and operators. Other areas require their licences.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.what_if_get_points_on_licence: Must notify council within 48 hours. May affect fitness depending on circumstances.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.can_i_refuse_a_fare: Hackney carriage - no except lawful excuse (e.g. safety concern, passenger abusive). Private hire - operator takes booking decision.
faqs_and_common_scenarios.what_is_grandfather_rights: Existing hackney carriage licences for non-wheelchair accessible vehicles can continue and be transferred to new owner. New additional licences must be wheelchair accessible.

notification_requirement.failure_to_notify: Serious breach - may result in revocation
